entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Academy of Sciences Institute of Political Sciences
entry.dcterms:description: the survey shows the relationships between values, attitudes and party preferences; special emphasis is put on the right-wing, conservative values
entry.dcterms:subject: psychology
social behaviour and attitudes
mass political behavior, attitudes
political institutions, public administration
religion and values
political ideology
person
survey data
cross-section

The sample is a combination of a multi-stage random selection and a quota-based selection. The sample represents the adult population of Hungary by gender, type of settlement, region, education and age.
face-to-face interview
A
